addRewardToPool(uint256).details: adds the provided amount to `totalPool` state variable

compoundAll().details: compounds the rewards of all users in the pool add adds it into their staked amount while deducting fees

emergencyWithdraw().details: transfer all available funds of users to users wallet

freezeStaking(uint256,address,address).details: adds the provided amount to the total frozen variablle

indexesLength().details: returns the total stakers in the staking pool by reading length of addressIndexes array

leaveStaking(uint256,bool).details: leaves staking and deducts total pool by the users reward. early withdrawal fee applied if withdraw is made before earlyWithdrawFeeTime

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params._address: the user's wallet address to calculate profits

returns._0: pending Profits to be claimed by this user

pendingReward(address).details: calculates potential reward for the address provided based on crush per block

params._address: the address to calculate the reward for

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setAutoCompoundLimit(uint256).details: stores the limit in the state variable `autoCompoundLimit`

setBankroll(address).details: stores the _bankroll address in the state variable `bankroll`

setEarlyWithdrawFee(uint256).details: stores the fee in the state variable `earlyWithdrawFee`

setEarlyWithdrawFeeTime(uint256).details: stores the time in the state variable `earlyWithdrawFeeTime`

setLiveWallet(address).details: stores the _liveWallet address in the state variable `liveWallet`

setPerformanceFeeBurn(uint256).details: stores the fee in the state variable `performanceFeeBurn`

setPerformanceFeeCompounder(uint256).details: stores the fee in the state variable `performanceFeeCompounder`

setPerformanceFeeReserve(uint256).details: stores the fee in the state variable `performanceFeeReserve`

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

unfreezeStaking(uint256).details: deducts the provided amount from the total frozen variablle

updateDistribution().details: accRewardPerShare is accumulative, meaning it always holds the total historic  rewardPerShare making apyBaseline necessary to keep rewards fair

updateProfits().details: this allows for consistent profit reporting and no change on profits to distribute

addRewardToPool(uint256).notice: Adds the provided amount to the totalPool

compoundAll().notice: compounds the rewards of all users in the pool

freezeStaking(uint256,address,address).notice: freeze certain funds in the staking pool and transfer them to the live wallet address

indexesLength().notice: returns the total count of users in the staking pool.

leaveStaking(uint256,bool).notice: Leaves staking for a user by the specified amount and transfering staked amount and reward to users address

pendingReward(address).notice: Get pending rewards of a user for UI

unfreezeStaking(uint256).notice: unfreeze previously frozen funds from the staking pool

updateDistribution().notice: updates accRewardPerShare based on the last block calculated and totalShares

updateProfits().notice: updates accProfitPerShare based on current Profit available and totalShares
